title: A collection of users within an organization.

name.description: Name for the group (used in determining the group's 'slug' value). Must be unique within the containing organization.

slug.description: Lowercased, hyphenated non-UUID identififer used in URIs.

rootOrganizationId.description: The ID of the root organization of the organization tree that this group belongs to.

createdOn.description: The date-time when the organization was created, in ISO 8601 format.
